article_title: How Well Is Obamacare Working, Is There an Alternative?
article_text:
Investors Eye a Possible Fed Rate Hike

09:31 - Mark Burgess, chief investment officer of EMEA at Columbia Threadneedle, discusses possible monetary policy from the Federal Reserve, and its impact on both investors and U.S. growth. He speaks with Guy Johnson and Matthew Miller on Bloomberg Television’s “On The Move.” (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description: Oct. 1 (Bloomberg) -- Former Republican Senator Judd Gregg discusses Obamacare on “Bottom Line.” (Source: Bloomberg)
